name: Cyocs
tag_list: cyocs, create, create-site, create-website, classifieds, create-classifieds-website
overview:
Cyocs.com is short for Create Your Own Classifieds Site. As the name says, it allows people to create a classifieds site for any purpose. A classifieds site can be created for a town/city or for a specific purpose.

For example, People who study in the same college can create a classifieds site for exchanging books and other materials.

People who share same apartments can create a site and exchange things, news etc.

More examples.. 1) A classifieds site for ‘iPod buy/sell in London’ 2) Site for ‘Jobs seek & post in Silicon Valley’ 3) Site for ‘Freelancing Tech work in Ukraine’ 4) Site for ‘Start-up Jobs and forums in Bangalore’ 5) Site for ‘Sell/Buy cars in Texas’

Sub-site creators can earn via Adsense. Subsite creators must provide their adsense id and ads will be served based on their id. Ads on a subsite will be served based on both the ids - adsense id of cyocs.com and sub site creator. The exact split of how much impressions each party gets is not disclosed by Cyocs.com.
